    • Constructor Detail

      • CounterException

        public CounterException(java.lang.String s)
        Reports errors occurring during the construction and use of counters. Various errors may occur when defining a counter. E.g.
        • counting in the wrong direction (e.g. from 0 to 10 in steps of -1)
        • using an increment value of 0
        Errors that could occur when running a counter could include:
        • trying to set a negative delay value
        • trying to set a maximum delay less than the minimum delay
        Parameters:
        s - the error message for this exception.
